articles.author: Stephen Council
articles.title: Stripe, the Bay Area's 2nd-largest tech startup, suddenly lays off 300 workers - SFGATE
articles.description: Stripe, a fintech juggernaut and the Bay Area's second-most valuable startup, is laying off 300 workers despite "strong" business performance.
articles.content:
Stripe, headquartered in South San Francisco on Oyster Point Boulevard, told staff on Monday, Jan. 20, 2025, that it was laying off 300 workers.
Courtesy of Google Streetview
